label: HandlingInstructions
comment: Handling information of an instructive nature.

datatypeProperties.comment: A textual description for the type of transportation waste recovery disposal process.

A procedure, expressed as text, for a set of inspection instructions.

objectProperties.comment: A transport related temperature setting applicable to these handling instructions.

The maximum stackability weight applicable to these handling instructions.
The measure of the maximum storage humidity applicable to these handling instructions.
The measure of the minimum storage humidity applicable to these handling instructions.
The instructed temperature for storage applicable to these handling instructions.
